title: Shooty Fruity Free
description:
Shooty Fruity game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Scan, serve & pack produce whilst shooting guns to defend your store from mutant fruit Shooty Fruity is a multi-tasking shooter only possible with a VR headset & motion control. Can you do your job as a sharpshooting shop clerk during the heat of combat? Take on new roles, unlock new weapons & blow up tons of fruit in your juicy career. Scan! Shoot! Repeat

system_requirements.Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
